item.title: 台湾禁止所有公共机构使用 DeepSeek 人工智能服务
item.description: 台湾以安全为由，禁止其所有政府机构和关键基础设施服务提供商使用中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的技术。【原文：Taiwan barred all of its government agencies and critical infrastructure service providers from using Chinese artificial-intelligence startup DeepSeek’s technology, citing security concerns.】

item.title: 欧洲的巨型电力电缆网络正在成为政治网络
item.description: 挪威政府本周的垮台使人们开始关注欧洲数百条跨境电力传输线，以及它们是如何被转化为政治武器的。【原文：The collapse of Norway’s government this week brings into focus the hundreds of cables transporting electricity across borders in Europe and how they’re being transformed into political weapons.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机激增凸显俄罗斯炼油风险
item.description: 在乌克兰无人机对俄罗斯炼油厂的袭击激增（包括周五发生的一起新事件）之后，俄罗斯继续以正常速度生产燃料的能力正变得越来越岌岌可危。【原文：Russia’s ability to keep making fuel at the normal pace is looking increasingly precarious following a surge in Ukrainian drone attacks on the nation’s oil refineries, including a fresh incident on Friday.】

item.title: 印度削减部分进口税以促进电子产品生产
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政府正在努力加强本地制造业，因此印度在联邦预算中取消了对几种电子元件征收的进口税。【原文：India scrapped import taxes on several electronics components in the federal budget, as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s administration seeks to bolster local manufacturing.】

item.title: 印度将放宽核法律以吸引私人资本
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，印度政府将修订核法律，以吸引私人资本并促进该行业的发展，指望原子能帮助印度摆脱化石燃料的依赖。【原文：India’s government will amend its nuclear laws to draw private capital and boost the sector’s growth, counting on atomic energy to help the country wean itself off fossil fuels, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said.】

item.title: 自英国脱欧投票以来，伦敦金融城受到的冲击大于其他经济体
item.description: 伦敦金融城曾被视为英国服务业皇冠上的明珠，但在英国脱欧公投后的几年里，其表现甚至不如其他经济部门。【原文：The City of London, once considered the crown jewel of Britain’s dominant services sector, has performed even worse than the rest of the economy in the years following the Brexit referendum.】

item.title: 印度明年将出售 1,710 亿美元债券为支出提供资金
item.description: 印度计划在下一财年出售总额为 14.82 万亿卢比（约合 1,710 亿美元）的债券。【原文：India plans to sell gross 14.82 trillion rupees ($171 billion) of bonds in the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 莫迪第三任期首份完整预算案的得与失
item.description: 财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）在第三届政府任期内的首个全年预算报告中概述了针对青年、妇女和农业的计划。【原文：Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman started her speech for government’s first full-year budget in the third term outlining plans aimed at youth, women, and agriculture.】

item.title: 印度目标缩小预算赤字，通过改革促进增长
item.description: 印度政府的目标是在下一个财政年度略微减少预算赤字，同时重点关注税收、电力和城市发展等关键领域的改革，以促进这个亚洲第三大经济体的增长。【原文：India’s government is targeting a slightly smaller budget deficit in the coming fiscal year, while focusing on reforms in key areas like taxes, power and urban development to boost growth in Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 新加坡将继续与美国密切合作，应对 DeepSeek 引起的担忧
item.description: 新加坡表示，由于担心中国人工智能公司 DeepSeek 通过岛内中介获得英伟达公司的芯片，新加坡海关和执法部门将继续与美国同行密切合作。【原文：Singapore said its customs and law enforcement departments will continue to work closely with US counterparts amid concerns China AI firm DeepSeek obtained Nvidia Corp. chips through intermediaries on the island.】

item.title: 德国重新思考军民研究分离问题
item.description: 在德国加大军费开支的同时，一些政治家和国防管理人员认为，公立大学是德国尚未开发的最大资源之一，双方正在酝酿一场冲突。【原文：As Germany ramps up spending on its military, a clash is brewing around what some politicians and defense executives say is one of the nation’s biggest untapped resources: public universities.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入低于预期，进一步显示经济增长放缓
item.description: 澳门一月份的博彩收入下降了 5.6%，低于分析师的预期，而且有迹象表明，中国疲软的消费情绪正在拖累这个全球最大博彩中心的经济复苏。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue fell 5.6% in January, missing analyst expectations and adding to signs that China’s weak consumer sentiment is dragging down a recovery in the world’s biggest gambling hub.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长预计今年降息步伐放缓
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，随着货币当局采取放缓的宽松政策步伐，基准利率今年可能会下调半个百分点。【原文：Philippine central bank Governor Eli Remolona said the benchmark interest rate may be reduced by a half percentage point this year, as monetary authorities adopt a slower pace of policy easing.】

item.title: 印度 2025 年预算演讲：关注实时更新和分析
item.description: 2 月 1 日，在新德里，印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman，中）和财政部其他成员离开财政部前往议会提交预算。摄影师：普拉卡什-辛格/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Nirmala Sitharaman, India finance minister, center, and other members of finance ministry leave the ministry to present the budget at the parliament in New Delhi on Feb. 1. Photographer: Prakash Singh/Bloomberg】

item.title: 人工智能竞争日趋激烈，OpenAI 的奥特曼又要开始世界巡演了
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官萨姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）将在未来几周内往返于东京、新德里、迪拜和德国之间，因为主导人工智能的竞争正变得更加紧迫。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman will spend the coming weeks jetting between Tokyo, New Delhi, Dubai and Germany as the race to dominate artificial intelligence takes on new urgency.】

item.title: DeepSeek 应用程序下载量居全球首位，印度遥遥领先
item.description: DeepSeek 的人工智能助手在 140 个市场的下载量最高的移动应用程序中名列榜首，其中印度的新用户所占比例最大。【原文：DeepSeek’s AI assistant topped the list of most downloaded mobile apps across 140 markets, with India accounting for the largest percentage of new users.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁逼近，韩国出口保持韧性
item.description: 1 月份，韩国出口保持增长势头，在国内政治动荡和唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁阴影笼罩的新年伊始保持乐观。【原文：South Korea’s exports maintained growth momentum in January, keeping optimism alive at the start of a year overshadowed by domestic political turmoil and Donald Trump’s tariff threat.】

item.title: 德克萨斯证券交易所融资 1.61 亿美元，预计 2026 年开始交易
item.description: 拟成立的德克萨斯证券交易所的母公司德克萨斯证券交易所集团公司（TXSE Group Inc.【原文：TXSE Group Inc., parent company of the proposed Texas Stock Exchange, closed its initial fundraising round at $161 million and said the TXSE has filed for registration as a bourse with the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 钢铁和铝关税将影响数百万吨进口商品
item.description: 铝和钢是唐纳德-特朗普总统第一任期内颁布的首批关税措施之一。预计周六将恢复这些措施，这将影响到数百万吨的进口金属。【原文：Aluminum and steel were among the first tariffs to be enacted during President Donald Trump’s first term. A revival of those measures is expected Saturday, which would affect millions of tons of imported metal.】

item.title: 穆迪两名评级分析师在华盛顿美航坠机事故中丧生
item.description: 信用评级公司穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的两名分析师克里斯托弗-柯林斯（Christopher Collins）和梅丽莎-尼坎德里（Melissa Nicandri）在周三晚美国航空集团公司（American Airlines Group Inc.【原文：Two analysts at Moody’s Ratings — Christopher Collins and Melissa Nicandri — were among the 67 people killed in a midair collision between an American Airlines Group Inc. flight and a military helicopter in Washington on Wednesday night, the credit-grading firm said.】

item.title: 美国法警不会在参议员要求的最后期限前列出加密资产清单
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士称，美国法警局将不会在周五的最后期限前告知一位有影响力的参议员其控制的比特币资产的确切数量以及计划如何管理这些资产。【原文：The US Marshals Service will not meet a Friday deadline to tell an influential senator the exact number of Bitcoin assets it controls and how it plans to manage them, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约市抨击优步和 Lyft 在司机加薪问题上 "造谣生事
item.description: 纽约市共享出行监管机构称，优步公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：New York City’s rideshare regulator said Uber Technologies Inc. and Lyft Inc. are “spreading disinformation” in emails sent to drivers and riders about proposed rules that would give drivers a roughly 6% pay hike.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚政治动荡后未能获得惠誉评级上调
item.description: 塞尔维亚未能获得惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）提升其主权信用评级，此前大规模抗议活动震撼了这个巴尔干国家，并对亚历山大-武契奇（Aleksandar Vucic）总统长达十年的统治提出了挑战。【原文：Serbia failed to secure an upgrade of its sovereign credit score from Fitch Ratings after mass protests shook the Balkan nation and challenged the decade-long rule of President Aleksandar Vucic.】

item.title: 卢比奥拉美之行带来特朗普的强硬信息
item.description: 马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）作为美国最高外交官的首次出访选择了拉丁美洲，这加强了唐纳德-特朗普总统在第二个任期初期的两个优先事项：驱逐出境和确保巴拿马运河不受中国控制。【原文：Marco Rubio’s choice of Latin America for his first trip abroad as top US diplomat reinforces two of President Donald Trump’s priorities early in his second term — deportations and securing the Panama Canal from perceived Chinese control.】

item.title: 市场危险的一周，华尔街掀起安全交易热潮
item.description: 中国的一项突破震撼了美国科技行业的核心。唐纳德-特朗普总统发誓要对主要贸易伙伴采取行动，关税大戏由此升级。鹰派的美联储再次令痴迷于通货膨胀的交易员们感到震惊。【原文：A breakthrough in China shakes the US tech sector to its core. Tariff drama escalates with President Donald Trump vowing action against major trading partners. A hawkish Federal Reserve jars inflation-obsessed traders anew.】

item.title: 美国牛群数量降至 74 年最低点，牛肉价格将持续走高
item.description: 由于牧场干燥和牛肉需求旺盛，牛群连续第五年未能扩大，美国的牛供应量降至 1951 年以来的最低点。【原文：America’s cattle supplies dropped to the lowest since 1951 as dry pastures and strong beef demand prevented the herd from expanding for the fifth straight year.】

item.title: Zayo 完成首次 14 亿美元光纤支持债券销售
item.description: 随着光纤网络公司 Zayo Group Holdings Inc.【原文：Fiber network firm Zayo Group Holdings Inc. completed its first bond sale backed by fiber-network infrastructure and customer contracts as issuance of such deals sees a strong start to the year.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州盟友警告：特朗普的科技伙伴难逃美国审查
item.description: 排着队向唐纳德-特朗普致敬的科技公司老板们可能在欧盟找到了共同的敌人，但据这位新总统的一位重要盟友说，这并不能使他们免于在自己的主场受到法律制裁。【原文：The tech bosses who’ve lined up to pay homage to Donald Trump may have found a common enemy in the European Union, but that won’t save them from legal enforcement on their home ground, according to one of the new president’s key allies.】

item.title: 前美联储顾问被美方指控为中国窃取机密
item.description: 美国司法部周五表示，美联储理事会的一名前高级顾问因涉嫌密谋窃取政府贸易机密以谋取中国利益而被捕。【原文：A former senior adviser for the Federal Reserve Board of Governors was arrested on charges that he conspired to steal government trade secrets to benefit China, the US Justice Department said Friday.】

item.title: 想主持右派 "叫她爸爸 "节目的保守派明星
item.description:
布雷特-库珀（Brett Cooper）新播客的第一集已经在 YouTube 上获得了 200 多万次观看。【原文：

The first episode of Brett Cooper’s new podcast has already garnered more than two million views on YouTube.

】
